category-def.name: com.coconut_plam_software.eclipsem2repo
category-def.label: Eclipse is a Maven 2 Repo
category-def.description: This plugin activates a web server at Eclipse startup and shuts it down on shutdown that turns Eclipse's own plugins folder into a Maven 2 compliant repository. It relies on a separate server process that it downloads dynamically (if not present) into your workspace configuration area
